apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji, featuring a woman with a dark skin tone and a partner with a medium-dark skin tone, is beautifully illustrated with Apple's signature 3D depth and soft, rounded styling. A glowing heart hovers between them, rendered with a glossy finish and warm red hue, symbolizing deep affection and connection. The gentle smiles and unified posture convey a palpable sense of love and togetherness, embodying romantic sentiment through Apple's expressive emoji design.
